reviews.review_msg: Very dry. It gets hard to get to lectures because  they can be very very boring.  She is definitely nice but I would say a bit of a tough marker.

MacLean knows her stuff, but POL  437 seemed like a waste of time. Not very interesting or engaging. It seemed like a review of Poli Sci 300 level courses. The lecturing style is tedious for a class with 15 people. Not recommended.
